CRITICAL_PRIORITY.impact: Potential RSA key decryption, PKCS12 DoS, NULL pointer dereference
CRITICAL_PRIORITY.truth_protocol_violation: Security baseline requires up-to-date crypto libraries

CRITICAL_PRIORITY.impact: Remote code execution, arbitrary file write
Arbitrary file overwrite during sdist installation

HIGH_PRIORITY.issue: MD5 hash usage for security purposes (10 occurrences)
HIGH_PRIORITY.impact: Weak cryptographic hashing, vulnerable to collisions
HIGH_PRIORITY.action: Replace MD5 with SHA-256 or use usedforsecurity=False parameter

HIGH_PRIORITY.impact: XML external entity attacks, DoS, information disclosure
HIGH_PRIORITY.truth_protocol_violation: Input validation required for all external data

HIGH_PRIORITY.impact: Credentials transmitted in cleartext, MITM attacks
HIGH_PRIORITY.action: Replace FTP with SFTP/SCP using paramiko or fabric
HIGH_PRIORITY.truth_protocol_violation: Security baseline requires encrypted protocols only

HIGH_PRIORITY.issue: SSH host key verification disabled (2 occurrences)
HIGH_PRIORITY.action: Implement proper host key verification with known_hosts

MEDIUM_PRIORITY.impact: Denial of service via resource exhaustion
MEDIUM_PRIORITY.action: Add timeout parameter to all requests calls

MEDIUM_PRIORITY.impact: Arbitrary code execution if untrusted data is deserialized
MEDIUM_PRIORITY.action: Use JSON or msgpack for data serialization instead of pickle

MEDIUM_PRIORITY.impact: Unnecessary exposure of services to external networks
MEDIUM_PRIORITY.action: Bind to 127.0.0.1 for local development, use firewall for production
Use parameterized queries with prepared statements
